note.p: Education: Schleswig Cathedral School; Jena; Kiel; MA (1673)

Career: Travelled in France and Holland (1673-1676); settled in England (1676); set up a private printing press in London with the permission of James II; after the death of his mother, travelled to Schleswig-Holstein (1688) and lost all his money in a 10-year legal case; lived in poverty in Hamburg
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Hunter; DBE; ADB
